definition: to teach/to impart/a disciple/descendant
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
biography/historical narrative/commentaries/relay station
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
Descendants of the Dragon (i.e. Han Chinese)
transmitted person-to-person

sentences.english: The little bonzer became the master's inheritor later.
sentences.chinese: 后来，这位小和尚成了师傅的衣钵传人。

sentences.english: Huineng became a Buddhist sect sixth generation descendants, this story for a long.
sentences.chinese: 慧能成为佛教南宗第六代传人，这故事流传相当久远。

sentences.english: The possibility of limited human-to-human transmission cannot be ruled out at present.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚不能排除有限的人传人的可能性。

sentences.english: We share the same roots, it is only nature that Dr. Sun's disciples should wear the mandarin suits.
sentences.chinese: 中山先生的传人都穿中山装，那是再自然不过的了。

sentences.english: We Chinese often consider ourselves "the descendants of the dragon."
sentences.chinese: 我们中国人经常称自己为“龙的传人”。

sentences.english: I understand that Cain is the last descendant of the ancient Horadrim and that his knowledge of their lore is vast.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，凯恩是古代赫拉迪姆教派的最后传人。

sentences.english: He comes from a family of puppeteers and is the sixth generation in his family to inherit this tradition.
sentences.chinese: 他出身于木偶表演世家，是家中第六代木偶戏传人。

sentences.english: This user is a Descendant of the Dragon .
To qualify to become an initiate of the draconic mysteries, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.
sentences.chinese: 要获得成为龙之传人的资格，人物必须满足以下标准。

sentences.english: The men who sat next to us are good at Kongfu, they have studied in the same Kongfu school with Jet Lee.
sentences.chinese: 旁边坐着的是我们中国功夫的传人，李连杰的师弟们。

sentences.english: From Selina to Karen and now on my hand.
sentences.chinese: 但它到我手时已经是第三代传人了。

sentences.english: Reducing the risk of human-to-human transmission.
The initiate's unarmed strike can overcome damage reduction as if it were a magic weapon.
sentences.chinese: 龙之传人的徒手攻击能像魔法武器一样克服伤害减免。

sentences.english: Only a few instances of limited human-to-human transmission have been recorded.
sentences.chinese: 目前只记录了有限的人传人的少数实例。

sentences.english: The current owner of Cheese Wei is the 4th generation successor of the Wei family.
sentences.chinese: 现如今经营这奶酪魏的是魏家的第四代传人了。

sentences.english: Broadsword family descendant JiZhao was xuantong emperor queen bodyguard.
sentences.chinese: 大刀世家传人齐昭曾是宣统皇帝御前侍卫。

definition: handed down in a direct line from the founder
last disciple of a master
handed down in a family/family traditions
family history (as a literary genre)
disciple/follower
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
the cassock and alms bowl of a Buddhist master passed on to the favorite disciple (Buddhism)/legacy/mantle
authentic tradition/handed-down teachings or techniques
to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc
to take up sb's mantle/to follow in sb's steps
(of skills etc) to die out/lost/extinct
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Confucian orthodoxy
apprentice/disciple
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
to have qualified successors to carry on one's undertaking
to formally become an apprentice to a master
